allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Zero to Crypto Developer platform

Features:
- AI-powered onboarding quiz that generates personalized Web3 projects
- Monaco code editor with Solidity syntax highlighting
- Claude AI tutor with Socratic teaching method
- Progressive lesson system with 17 pre-built lessons
- Solidity compiler with real-time error feedback
- Supabase auth + database with RLS policies
- Coinbase Smart Wallet integration for Base Sepolia

Tech stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, Supabase, Anthropic Claude

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update Claude Code local settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project roadmap and task list

Outlines 6 phases from MVP to production with detailed tasks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add gamification, streaming AI, and deploy features

Phase 2 & 3 implementation:

Gamification & Retention:
- Streaming AI responses with Vercel AI SDK \(@ai-sdk/anthropic\)
- Chat history persistence to Supabase
- Progressive hint system \(3 levels\)
- Lesson completion tracking with progress bar
- Streak tracking with daily engagement rewards

Deploy & Share:
- Wallet connect button \(Coinbase Smart Wallet\)
- Deploy to Base Sepolia with transaction status
- Contract interaction panel \(read/write functions\)
- Public shareable project page \(/share/[id]\)
- Share button in IDE toolbar

New components:
- components/wallet/ConnectButton.tsx
- components/wallet/DeployButton.tsx
- components/wallet/ContractInteraction.tsx
- components/gamification/StreakDisplay.tsx

New routes:
- app/api/ai/chat \(streaming endpoint\)
- app/share/[id] \(public project view\)

SQL migrations:
- 001_add_streaks.sql \(streak tracking\)
- 002_public_projects.sql \(public viewing policies\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -c "SELECT datname FROM pg_database WHERE datname = ''crypto_coding_app'';")
Bash(powershell -Command "$env:PGPASSWORD=''postgres''; & ''C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe'' -U postgres -h localhost -c ''SELECT 1 as test;''")
Bash(cmd /c "set PGPASSWORD=postgres && ""C:\\Program Files\\PostgreSQL\\17\\bin\\psql.exe"" -U postgres -h localhost -c ""SELECT 1 as test;""")
